thread.section_title: Classificações sobre a Travelgenio | Comentários de clientes da Travelgenio | travelgenio.pt
thread.title: Fu Dan

author: Fu Dan
title: Fu Dan
text: I dont accept the change for my tickets! I need cancel my payment and get refund! I've already bought another ticket back to Helsinki. I dont need any ticket anymore. Please request for my refund. Yesterday I called your company for 13minutes, it costs me 5 e. they told me they will help me ask refund. Now you tell me the changed time was confirmed, i am very angry.
